title: Ringtone: pixel 3a: have moved an MP3 into ringtone folder but I can't see it to pick as ringtone
content: I have moved an MP3 file used on my old phone as a ringtone into the ringtone folder on my pixel 3a but when I try and select it as a ringtone it is not available. Does it have to be on ogg format now?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
